timeline.message:
Add basic support for MySQL

Table names are case sensitive in MySQL, therefor made references to
tables all uppercase.
Use table IBISTEMP for BatchFileTransformerPipe, drop table IBISDATA
Use LONGBLOB/LONGCLOB datatypes in Liquibase for BLOBs
Fix NPE in IbisDebuggerAdvice when in jms afterMessageProcessed

timeline.bodyText: oh oh, kom ik weer met mijn ENUM's
timeline.author: nielsm5
nielsm5

timeline.bodyText: Misschien kan dit geheel vervangen worden met return JDBCType.valueOf(type)
